  }} 'The Unknown' was a 1915 film directed by J.E. Mathews released in support
  of [[The Sunny South or The Whirlwind of Fate]] (1915). It is a comedy fight
  film starring two boxers and was shot in Newcastle over December 1914 and
  January 1915. [http://ozvta.files.wordpress.com/2011/04/kearns-jack.pdf
  'Jack "Porky" Kearns' at Australian Variety Theatre Archive] It starred
  two boxers and is considered a lost film. Andrew Pike and Ross
  Cooper, Australian Film 1900â1977: A Guide to Feature Film Production,
  Melbourne: Oxford University Press, 1998, p 52
